Sentencas: The microstructure of the cathodes plays a crucial role in the performance of the cell and electrocatalytic reduction of steam into hydrogen in SOEC applications.
Titulo: Microstructural development of Ni-1Ce10ScSZ cermet electrode for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) application

Sentencas: In the present work, a novel ionic-conducting ceramic 1Ce10ScSZ is used for the Ni-1Ce10ScSZ cermet cathode electrode development, as it has better ionic conductivity than the conventional 8YSZ.
Titulo: Microstructural development of Ni-1Ce10ScSZ cermet electrode for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) application

Sentencas: For this, symmetrical cells were fabricated using screen printing technique.
Titulo: Microstructural development of Ni-1Ce10ScSZ cermet electrode for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) application

Sentencas: The dominant factors such as sintering temperature, composition and thickness on the microstructure and polarisation resistance of the cermet are suitably optimized.
Titulo: Microstructural development of Ni-1Ce10ScSZ cermet electrode for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) application

Sentencas: 1300 degrees C was found to be the most convenient sintering temperature and the 60% NiO-40% 1Ce10ScSZ (by volume) as the most suitable composition.
Titulo: Microstructural development of Ni-1Ce10ScSZ cermet electrode for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) application
